hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah came on the fourth day of Dhul-Hijjah having entered Ihram for Hajj. He prayed Subh in Al-Batha and said: 'Whoever wants to make it Umrah, let him do so

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوَقْتِ الَّذِي وَافَى فِيهِ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم مَكَّةَ
chapter.eng-name: The Time When The Prophet (ﷺ) Arrived In Makkah
